title: Mexico : foreign direct investment ( FDI ) 3rd quarter 2019 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of FDI on the Y-axis for 9 different Countrys for 2 groups Q2 2019, and Q3 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country United States had the maximum Share of FDI among all 2 groups, and it was for Q2 2019. The minimum Share of FDI was observed in Country Belgium for Q2 2019.
Country United States and Belgium had the biggest gap of 3606.0 between the highest and lowest Share of FDI found for Q2 2019.
On average, the Country United States had the highest Share of FDI for all 2 groups Q2 2019, and Q3 2019. Whereas Belgium had the lowest average Share of FDI.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of FDI on the Y-axis for 9 different Countrys for 2 groups Q2 2019, and Q3 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Country United States, Q2 2019 had the highest Share of FDI 3607.0 among the 2 groups and in Belgium, Q2 2019 had the lowest Share of FDI 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of FDI on the Y-axis for 9 different Countrys for 2 groups Q2 2019, and Q3 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country United States had the maximum Share of FDI among all 2 groups, and it was for Q2 2019. The minimum Share of FDI was observed in Country Belgium for Q2 2019.
Country United States and Belgium had the biggest gap of 3606.0 between the highest and lowest Share of FDI found for Q2 2019.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Q2 2019, and Q3 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of FDI.
Out of all 2 groups, Q2 2019 had the highest Share of FDI for Country United States and Q2 2019 had the lowest Share of FDI for Country Belgium.
For Country United States, Q2 2019 had the maximum Share of FDI and it saw the lowest in Country Belgium out of all 9 Countrys.
There is a gap of 3606.0 between the highest and lowest Share of FDI found for Q2 2019 in Country United States and Belgium.
Among the groups, Q2 2019 had the biggest difference in Share of FDI. Where the maximum Share of FDI was 3607.0 times larger than the minimum Share of FDI.
Averaging all 2 groups Q2 2019, and Q3 2019, the Country United States is the maximum Share of FDI and Belgium is the minimum Share of FDI.
